explanation: [0-0] A drone is parked on a rocky surface, with a volcano erupting lava and smoke in the distance. The caption "I MELTED MY DRONE FOR THIS SHOT" appears on the screen, followed by a volcano erupting emoji.
[0-2] The drone flies upward, kicking up some dirt, and then reappears from the upper left, flying towards the volcano.
[0-2] The drone flies upward, kicking up some dirt, and then reappears from the upper left, flying towards the volcano.

[2-11] The scene then switches to above the lava flow. The caption at the top of the screen disappears. A bright orange river of lava is visible. As the drone moves downward, the flowing orange lava can be seen continuously moving through the black volcanic rock towards the crater.
